comments.body:
Like `Scala-2.11` deprecation, can we deprecate this in Spark 2.4.4 since Spark 2.4.4 will be delivered before Spark 3.0.0?
cc @gatorsmile , @srowen , too.
I don't have a strong opinion, but generally think it's fine to deprecate things we know we want to deprecate sooner than later.
I don't have a strong opinion too. This deprecation isn't that important about which version we should drop.
